bib.title: Semi-automatic Handwritten Word Segmentation Based on Character Width Approximation Via Maximum Likelihood Method and Regression Model
bib.author: Sas, Jerzy and Kurzynski, Marek
bib.abstract: The paper presents a method of word image segmentation into images of individual characters. The method is semi-automatic, because it requires that the character sequence constituting the word on the image is know. It is assumed that widths of the characters in the alphabet are random variables and that the parametres of probability distribution are specific for each character.
